message.content:
1. Patients with stable disease were randomised to different treatments.
2. Patients who responded after GEM-CAP were randomised to different treatments.
3. One treatment option was capecitabine or UFT plus radiotherapy (RT).
4. This treatment option is referred to as (A).
5. Another treatment option was capecitabine or UFT plus cetuximab plus RT.
6. This treatment option is referred to as (B).
7. The randomisation involved patients who had undergone GEM-CAP treatment.
8. Cetuximab was included in one of the treatment options.
9. Radiotherapy was included in both treatment options. 
10. Either capecitabine or UFT was included in both treatment options.

messages.content:
Statement: Patients with stable disease or response after GEM-CAP were randomised to capecitabine or UFT plus radiotherapy (RT) (A), or capecitabine or UFT plus cetuximab plus RT (B).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
